Nomadland has won the Golden Globe for best picture drama, making history for the Globes, as well as for director Chloe Zhao and for the Nomadland producing team.

articles.description: The director who produced 'Nomadland' as well is the first Asian woman to win Best Picture Drama as a producer.
articles.title: Chloe Zhao becomes second woman to win Golden Globe for directing in 78 years - The Star Online

SINGAPORE - Foreign worker Marimuthu S. never got to meet his 10-month-old daughter.
When his wife gave birth to their second girl in India last April, Singapore was going through its circuit breake… [+2898 chars]
articles.description: SINGAPORE - Foreign worker Marimuthu S. never got to meet his 10-month-old daughter. When his wife gave birth to their second girl in India last April, Singapore was going through its circuit breaker period. The last time he had been back home was in August 2…
articles.title: 'He was the pillar of his family': Tuas fire victim never got to meet his 10-month-old daughter - AsiaOne
